field.name: studieslisttemplateid
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATE_STUDIES_LIST
field.query: SELECT id, title FROM #__bsms_templates WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY text ASC

field.name: detailstemplateid
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATE_STUDY_DETAIL
field.query: SELECT id, title FROM #__bsms_templates WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY text ASC

field.name: teachertemplateid
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATE_TEACHER
field.query: SELECT id, title FROM #__bsms_templates WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY text ASC

field.name: serieslisttemplateid
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATE_SERIES_LIST
field.query: SELECT id, title FROM #__bsms_templates WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY text ASC

field.name: seriesdetailtemplateid
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATE_SERIES_DETAIL
field.query: SELECT id, title FROM #__bsms_templates WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY text ASC

field.name: series_id
field.query: SELECT #__bsms_series.id AS sid, #__bsms_series.series_text, #__bsms_series.published AS srpub, #__bsms_studies.series_id, #__bsms_studies.published AS spub FROM #__bsms_series LEFT JOIN #__bsms_studies ON ( #__bsms_studies.id = #__bsms_series.id ) WHERE #__bsms_series.published = 1
field.label: JBS_CMN_FILTERS_SERIES

field.name: booknumber
field.query: SELECT DISTINCT #__bsms_studies.booknumber AS sbn, #__bsms_studies.published AS spub, #__bsms_books.booknumber AS bbn, #__bsms_books.bookname FROM #__bsms_books LEFT JOIN #__bsms_studies ON (#__bsms_studies.booknumber = #__bsms_books.booknumber) WHERE #__bsms_studies.published = 1 ORDER BY #__bsms_books.booknumber ASC
field.label: JBS_CMN_FILTERS_BOOKS

field.name: topic_id
field.query: SELECT DISTINCT #__bsms_topics.id AS tid, #__bsms_topics.topic_text, #__bsms_studies.topics_id, #__bsms_studytopics.topic_id, #__bsms_studytopics.study_id FROM #__bsms_studies LEFT JOIN #__bsms_topics ON (#__bsms_topics.id = #__bsms_studies.topics_id) LEFT JOIN #__bsms_studytopics ON (#__bsms_studytopics.id = #__bsms_studies.topics_id)
field.label: JBS_CMN_FILTERS_TOPICS

field.name: embedshare
field.label: JBS_TPL_MEDIA_EMBEDSHARE
field.description: If set to Show a menu is presented in the internal media player that allows sharing and embedding options

field.name: templatecode
field.default:
{{teacher}} {{title}} {{date}}
{{studyintro}} {{scripture}}
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEMPLATECODE

field.name: teacher_templatecode
field.default:
{{teacher}} {{title}} {{teacher}}
{{short}} {{information}}
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEACHERLIST_TEMPLATECODE

field.name: teacher_detailtemplate
field.default:
{{teacher}} {{title}} {{teacher}}
{{short}} {{information}}
field.label: JBS_TPL_TEACHERDETAIL_TEMPLATECODE
